hero.title:
Pure Water &
**Clean Air Solutions**
hero.subtitle: Advanced filtration technology for a healthier home and office environment.

story.title: Our Story
story.description: Founded in 2010, HydroAir Technologies is dedicated to providing the highest quality air and water filtration systems. We believe clean air and water are fundamental human rights.

items.label: Activated Carbon
items.desc: Removes chlorine, odors, and organic compounds.

items.label: Reverse Osmosis
items.desc: Removes dissolved solids and heavy metals.

items.label: Ion Exchange
items.desc: Softens water by removing calcium and magnesium.

items.label: Mineralization
items.desc: Adds essential minerals back into purified water.

items.q: How often should I change filters?
items.a: We recommend changing air filters every 6-12 months and water filters every 3-6 months, depending on usage.
Yes, we offer professional installation for all our filtration systems in select regions.
All our products come with a standard 2-year warranty covering manufacturing defects.
Yes, we accept returns within 30 days of purchase if the product is unused and in original packaging.

items.q: How do I choose the right filter?
items.a: Contact our support team or check the product specifications to find the best match for your needs.
We offer free shipping on orders over $100.
Yes, we ship to most countries worldwide. Shipping rates vary by location.

about.title: About HydroAir Technologies
about.description: We are a leading provider of advanced air and water filtration solutions, committed to bringing pure, safe, and healthy environments to every household and office.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: Founded in 2010, HydroAir Technologies was born from a simple realization: access to clean air and water is a fundamental human right. Since then, we've dedicated ourselves to sourcing the world's best filtration technology and making it accessible to families worldwide.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: Have questions about our filtration systems? Our team is here to help you choose the best solution for your needs.
